1163080.name: The Cook, The Slasher and the Extractor
1163080.description:
The Cook, The Slasher and The Extractor is a 2D top-down extraction-survival action game blending fast-paced combat, resource management, and cooking mechanics. Each run drops you into procedurally generated arenas crawling with AI-driven enemies and rival scavengers. You must loot materials, cook meals for buffs, and extract alive before time or enemies end your run.

The gameplay loop revolves around risk and reward—push deeper into hostile zones for better loot or extract early to secure your gains. Combat is visceral and strategic, using both melee and ranged weapons inspired by classic arcade brutality. Between missions, the kitchen acts as your safe zone and upgrade hub, where cooking ingredients affects your stats, abilities, and sanity.

The tone is darkly comedic, violent, and chaotic—a surreal descent into survival obsession where even your recipes can kill you.
